name: cni-store-proxy
description: Reverse proxy for the ChRIS_store API to automatically register and run uploaded plugins

scripts.postinstall: which docker > /dev/null || exit 0 && git submodule update --init
scripts.prestart: yarn -s run cube:check || ( yarn run cube:up && ./prepare.sh )
scripts.cube:restart: yarn run cube:down && yarn run cube:up

author: Jennings Zhang <Jennings.Zhang@childrens.harvard.edu>
